attributes.title: scarred for life !
attributes.review: Horrible it was scarring to see a cheeto in the form of a human and to think 2020 was a good year but this app went downhill back in 2016! I Karen would like to speak to its mother to ask her to be very pro abortion specifically around the time the cheeto has been born 😡😡. If i could give it 0 stars i defenitly would 🤬

attributes.title: BAD!!
attributes.review: first of all I don’t like having to go to the doctors to get my eyes checked, again!!! Why?? Because me having to look at TruMp first thing when opening the app is LAVA to my eyes. Absolutely destroyed my eyes. I 10/10 DONT recommend!!! His face can cause serious damage to others... be safe y’all!!

attributes.title: awful
attributes.review: I wanted to have a relaxing day with my three kids, Brayheidn, Mackghuenzy, and Couhrtniey, while I went to my local park. This stupid orange man kept sending me notifications!!! I was trying to tell a 16 year old employee that I don’t have to wear a mask when I kept being harassed by this cheeto. 0/5 stars. 🤢🤮🤮🤮

attributes.title: No. I can’t
attributes.review: I opened the app and it booted me off. Every time I opened it, it would close down again. It did the same for my brother who said that it was Trumps way of telling us that we weren’t good enough for the nation. So I guess my vote will go to someone who’s app actually works. Stupid Cheeto...

attributes.title: My poor kids.....
attributes.review: I opened the app, and it was just a picture of him smiling. I was with my kids. He was just smiling and it kept repeating, “snowflake, Trump 2020” it was terrifying and loud. I quickly deleted it, and my poor kids were in tears. They were so scared asking “mommy, why was the Cheeto talking?? Cheetos don’t talk!!” Don’t download.

attributes.title: this app is the worst thing to ever happen.
attributes.review: Wow. This is insane. Absolutely insane. I cannot stand the audacity. I entered into the app and my phone started smelling so bad... like a pig. And soon, i saw some CHEETO on my screen? A cheeto? So immature! I was expecting this app to be mature but when my screen is blurred with a sickening orange lump of wrinkly skin, it is absolutely disgusting.

attributes.title: Don’t get it
attributes.review: When I closed the app it opened back up and showed my family and friends dying and I was tied to a wall 😭 then I shut my phone off and it cut back on and said your next now I’m scarred for life and I have to got to a therapist every day for 7 hours

attributes.title: Absolutely disgraceful
attributes.review: Horrible nudity! I let my child go on this app to see our president and the first thing that popped up was a nude photo of the entire Trump family. I realize that this app 17+, but that’s no reason for there to be nude photos. This app is everything wrong with America since bunker boy became president😳🤢🤮🤕

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: ugh honestly SOOOO disappointing! Just like his presidency!!! THE APP IS JUST GOD AWFUL, I open it just too see an obese Cheeto pumping his fist like he’s rocky or something. the aesthetic appeal is NOT there, I honestly thought the designers of this app would know that fake tan is SOOOOO last year, but oh well I guess boomers are late to the trend 🥱🥱 anyways worst app ever, enough said. 😘
